endpoints.description: Retrieve measured and calculated carbon emissions data for the specified industry.
Submit a carbon reduction plan for the industry, specifying targets and timetables.
Obtain the current compliance status and recommendations to meet environmental regulations.
Register a project intended to offset carbon emissions for review and analysis.
Access detailed insights into the energy usage of industry operations.
Enable the submission of equipment details to evaluate its efficiency and propose upgrades.
Discover recommended best practices based on the industry type and location.
Enroll organizational staff in training programs about sustainable energy practices.
List available financial incentives for adopting sustainable operations.
Submit feedback or flag inaccuracies in generated environmental reports or data.
